LanguageData.Telegraph.label: telegraph station
LanguageData.Telegraph.description: The telegraph station allows communcication with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
LanguageData.Telegraph_Blueprint.label: telegraph station (blueprint)
LanguageData.Telegraph_Blueprint_Install.label: telegraph station (blueprint)
LanguageData.Telegraph_Frame.label: telegraph station (building)
LanguageData.Telegraph_Frame.description: The telegraph station allows communcication with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
LanguageData.WireTransferBeacon.label: wire transfer beacon
LanguageData.WireTransferBeacon.description: Required for wired monetary transactions via the telegraph station. Can be placed indoors.
LanguageData.WireTransferBeacon_Blueprint.label: wire transfer beacon (blueprint)
LanguageData.WireTransferBeacon_Frame.label: wire transfer beacon (building)
LanguageData.WireTransferBeacon_Frame.description: Required for wired monetary transactions via the telegraph station. Can be placed indoors.
